forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 65, with temperatures falling to around 63 in the afternoon. West southwest wind around 17 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 56. West southwest wind 9 to 17 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph.

weather_report:
The evening air in Downtown San Francisco carries an air of tranquility, as the day transitions from sunlight to a gentle darkness. With the temperature dropping into the mid-fifties, the evening is set to unfold under a mostly cloudy sky, with the remnants of warmth lingering just enough to keep one comfortable. A west-southwest breeze, vibrant yet soothing, dances through the streets, offering just enough coolness to embrace the signature coastal charm of the city.

The outlook for tonight promises a delightful cozy ambiance, ideal for a leisurely stroll through the streets or perhaps settling into a nearby café for conversations or a good book. While the sunshine has faded, the clouds offer a soft cover, and for those seeking adventure, the nearby waterfront invites quiet moments as the waves murmur against the shore. A light jacket would be a wise choice, ensuring comfort against the evening chill, but there is no need for heavy layers; just enough to enjoy the gentle embrace of a San Francisco night.
